I want you to sing with your voice at about the same volume as your vocalization. I want you to sing with your belly and use your big breath. I want you to sing with your hands once so that you can sing with a proper understanding of what kind of expression and facial expression you should use.
I want you to understand what kind of expression you should sing and what kind of facial expression you should use.
